Jordan Bibla Design and Development

Hey! Thanks for taking an interest. Here's a list of 12 things about me.

  1. I was born and raised in Toronto, Canada.
  2. I've played recreational hockey for the last 20 years.
  3. I love Jazz.
  4. I like spending time in the woods.
  5. I play the bass and am learning the banjo.
  6. I'm launching a podcast about existential design and brain science.
  7. I believe firmly in the power of design methodology.
  8. I ride my bicycle (almost) everyday it doesn't snow.
  9. I'm always trying to be more compassionate, more empathetic, and more mindful.
  10. I write HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, CoffeeScript, and English.
  11. I have an honours degree in comparative religion and sustainability from Concordia University.
  12. I completed one year of multimedia design and web development courses at Humber College.

If you are keen on collaborating on a project or hiring me for a freelance opportunity, please feel free to reach out anyway you'd like.

And here's my resume.

Thank you kindly.
